entry.title: Make sure you’re stepping away from your machines, and going out to get some fresh air. And be sure to grab a snack, drink plenty of water, and have ...
entry.summary: Make sure you’re stepping away from your machines, and going out to get some fresh air. And be sure to grab a snack, drink plenty of water, and have human interactions outside of tech and web3. These are important and good for you 🙂 Have a good weekend, folks

entry.title: RT Andrii 🇺🇦: 🛡 Web3 security tip: Create a separate browser profile, not connected to any of your Web2 thresholds, for the hot wallet (like ...
entry.summary: RT Andrii 🇺🇦 🛡 Web3 security tip: Create a separate browser profile, not connected to any of your Web2 thresholds, for the hot wallet (like @MetaMask 🦊 and @phantom 👻) interactions - it will save you from connecting to malicious websites via random links(like email, Discord, etc.).
